Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Establishes the fentanyl abuse and overdose prevention task force
Summary: Establishes the fentanyl abuse and overdose prevention task force to conduct a comprehensive study on fentanyl abuse and overdose prevention and to report on the findings and recommendations of the task force.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing the fentanyl abuse and overdose prevention task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
